other_tests.findings: Barrett esophagus with a single mildly dysplastic gland.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up endoscopy in 1997 showed Barrett esophagus without evidence of dysplasia. Most recent endoscopy in March 2002 again showed Barrett esophagus without evidence of dysplasia.

other_tests.findings: Barrett esophagus without evidence of dysplasia.
